actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that amounts paid for first-class postage in connection with the payment of medical expenses shall be treated as a deductible medical expense.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax medical deduction for paid for first-class postage in connection with the payment of medical expenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that amounts paid for first-class postage in connection with the payment of medical expenses shall be treated as a deductible medical expense.
